reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information, payment data, social media login data, and information automatically collected, such as IP addresses and device characteristics.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions multiple types of data collected by the app, which includes personal information, payment data, social media login data, and automatically collected information like IP addresses. These various data types are used for different purposes as outlined in the policy.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that data is collected for various reasons such as data analysis, determining usage trends, evaluating and improving services, products, marketing, and user experience. It specifies that personal information will not be used without consent and provides details on the legal bases for processing data.
reply.reference: The privacy policy states that data is collected for purposes such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of promotional campaigns, and to evaluate and improve services, products, marketing, and user experience. It also mentions the legal bases for processing data. URL: https://www.thematrescence.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection or delete data. Users have the right to request access, change, or delete the personal information collected from them. They can also object to data processing, request corrections or restrictions, designate an authorized agent to act on their behalf, and opt-out of selling their personal information to third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the user's rights to request access, changes, or deletion of their personal information and to opt-out of data collection under various circumstances. Users have multiple options to control their data privacy.
reply.reference: Based on the applicable laws of your country, you may have the right to request access to the personal information we collect from you, change that information, or delete it in some circumstances. To request to review, update, or delete your personal information, please submit a request form by clicking here. URL: https://www.thematrescence.com/privacy-policy/ Active databases. However, we may retain some information in our files to prevent fraud, troubleshoot problems, assist with any investigations, enforce our Terms of Use and/or comply with applicable legal requirements.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third-party vendors, service providers, contractors, or agents for various services such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing efforts.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares data with third parties for specific services and operations.
reply.reference: We may share your data with third-party vendors, service providers, contractors or agents who perform services for us or on our behalf and require access to such information to do that work. Examples include: payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service and marketing efforts. URL: https://www.thematrescence.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third-party vendors, service providers, contractors, or agents who assist in payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing efforts. These also include selected third parties who use tracking technology on the Services to analyze and track data.
